name: Pub Crawl (Bionic Ape)
description:
Get as many drinks as you can!! But beware, you might lose your balance...

Lean away from the arrow (drunk force) to compensate wobble if you reach the Maximum Velocity you are wasted Remember to Snack and eat as much as you can, after all we all cheat.

Trata de compensar la borrachera indicada con las flechas con tu control, recuerda comer de vez en cuando, te ayudará a devolverte la energía.

Drink and keep the balance compensating the arrow direction.

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD-> Movement

Mosue-> Camera

Space-> Jump

Gamepad:

Right Stick -> Movement

Left Stic-> Camera

Face Down Button (A)-> Jump
